coreAtributes.name: strapless strap-on
coreAtributes.description: A 10-inch dildo made of self-cleaning, arcane-cured silicone, which is designed to be worn vaginally. It features a textured clitoral pad, as well as a handle shaped to target the wearer's G-Spot.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull out the strapless dildo from your [pc.vagina+].
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You firmly grab [npc.name]'s strapless dildo and yank it out of [npc.herHis] [npc.vagina+].
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls out the strapless dildo from your [pc.vagina+].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] firmly grabs your strapless dildo and yanks it out of your [pc.vagina+].
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] firmly grabs [npc2.name]'s strapless dildo and yanks it out of [npc2.herHis] [npc2.vagina+].

replacementText.playerSelf: You push the strapless dildo into your [pc.vagina+].
replacementText.playerNPC: You push the strapless dildo into [npc.name]'s [npc.vagina+].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the strapless dildo into [npc.herHis] [npc.vagina+].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] push the strapless dildo into your [pc.vagina+].
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.sheHe] roughly forces the strapless dildo into your [pc.vagina+]
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.sheHe] roughly forces the strapless dildo into [npc2.herHis] [npc2.vagina+].
